node.title: From the Weed of Death to the Word of Life
node.description: Born and raised in Hawaii, Taj grew up in a non-Christian home and at an early age chose to live a wild life--one full of drugs, addictions, and succumbing to peer pressure. However, at age 16, Taj attended a Bible prophecy seminar that changed his life forever. Today he's a much sought after international evangelist and revivalist for God, traveling to countries all around the world.
